On Jan 2, 2007, at 4:15 PM, Chris Burdess wrote:

> If we assume that
> /mydocument *does* change, i.e. that it is equivalent to
> /mydocument;current or maybe /mydocument?revision=current , and always
> reflects the state of the last change

The problem with this is that it only works with linear versioning;  
branching is not possible.

Jan
